original_title: Flip Flop Flippin': One man's search for character(s) on the A.T.
overview: Scott "Squatch" Herriott section-hiked the 2,650 mile-long Pacific Crest Trail and made four films about his adventures. Now he attempts to hike the entire 2,100+ mile-long Appalachian Trail in one hiking season while searching for the interesting, inspiring, sometimes whacked-out, and always dirt-laden folk who make up the long-distance hiking community.
title: Flip Flop Flippin': One man's search for character(s) on the A.T.
